news: [Functional Roadmap] Database: MemSQL Couchbase Netezza, Injection strategies: DIOS RoutedQuery OOB UpdateInsertDelete, Full Path Disclosure, Bruteforce HTTP Auth using NTLM, Dictionnary attack, WAF detection.
[Technical Roadmap] Test coverage with Jacoco, Integration test with Docker and JPA Hibernate Jooq, Maven Central: core swing cli.
[Gui Roadmap] Dump to a file, Arabic translation, Program self-updater.
[Since last release] Database: CockroachDB Mckoi Neo4j NuoDB Hana and Vertica, Coldfusion injection, Translation updates: cz zh fr, New language: pl, Translation complete: ru.
[In progress] Database: Couchbase, Load from/to no. of row/char, User Agent configuration.

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
